server.name: io.github.foxitsoftware/foxit-pdf-api-mcp-server
server.description: MCP server that exposes Foxit PDF API capabilities via stdio.
server.title: Foxit PDF API MCP Server

environmentVariables.description: Foxit PDF Services host, e.g. https://na1.fusion.foxit.com/pdf-services
environmentVariables.name: FOXIT_CLOUD_API_HOST

environmentVariables.description: Client ID for Foxit PDF API from foxit developer portal(https://developer-api.foxit.com/)
environmentVariables.name: FOXIT_CLOUD_API_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: Client secret for Foxit PDF API from foxit developer portal(https://developer-api.foxit.com/)
environmentVariables.name: FOXIT_CLOUD_API_CLIENT_SECRET
